note:
Gary is a Partner and member of the Board of Directors​ of Paradigm Consulting Group.
He focuses on identifying / delivering consulting engagements and helping clients innovate their businesses​.
Prior to Paradigm, he held various senior consulting / IT services related roles at LGS Group and HP.​
He holds a Bachelor in Computer Science & Agriculture and Masters of Agricultural Economics & Farm Business Management from University of Manitoba and Fellow Certified Management Consultant (FCMC)​.
